DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate performance LSH ( mangofilcon A ) silicone hydrogel soft contact lens use daily wear contact lens correction myopia .
DOC.brief_title: LSH Silicone Hydrogel Soft Hydrophilic Contact Lens Daily Wear
DOC.criteria: Have advise contact lenses wear next 3 month use investigational purpose inform consent need document prior start study . Visual acuity must correctable 20/30 , spherical lens range power 1.00 5.00D , astigmatismâ‰¤1.50D . Have successfully wear soft ( hydrophilic ) contact lenses least one month prior enter study . ( Success mean subject practitioner satisfy visual acuity , comfort , ocular physiology ) . Have nondiseased eye normal preexist ocular condition would interfere patient 's ability adapt new pair LSH Silicone Hydrogel Soft ( hydrophilic ) Contact Lenses . A normal eye define one follow characteristic : 1 . No evidence lid infection . 2 . No structural lid abnormality . 3 . No conjunctival abnormality infection . 4 . A cornea clear edema , stain , vascularization abnormal opacity , observe slit lamp examination . 5 . No iritis . 6 . No active ocular disease would contraindicate use investigational lens . 7 . No GPC ( giant papillary conjunctivitis , tarsal abnormality ) Grade 2 great Use ocular medication . Have know sensitivity solution currently use contact lens care . Have binocular correction contact lenses . Exclusion Criteria Astigmatism > 1.50D No monocular monovision fit may include . Pregnant lactate woman exclude study Minors ( age 18 ) exclude study
